content:
We just upgraded from HAPI 4.1 (R4/4.0.0) that had no profiles but had one custom extension for search to 5.3 (R4/4.0.1). We cannot access any resource bcoz of errors related to coding systems

"Unknown Code System 'http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/Race'"

"Unknown Code System 'http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/Ethnicity'"

and 

"if a date has a time, it must have a timezone"

any pointers will be much appreciated. FYI here is our test FHIR server http://52.91.59.1:8080/fhir/Patient?_format=json&_pretty=true
@Lloyd McKenzie @Grahame Grieve please help
You'll get good assistance if you ask this in #hapi
